reviews.productTitle: Nexete Smart Wi-Fi Double Light Switch, 2 in1 Single Pole Switch Compatible with Alexa Google Assistant & IFTTT,Remote Control, Timing Function No Hub Required (1-Pack Double)
reviews.text: I've installed well over 100 IoT devices, primarily for Alexa integration. I had just tried an Aqara dual switch with no success (the hub read 2 switched but only passed one to Alexa) and this no-name-brand, especially with generic "Smart Life" app, had me doubting success. Wow--it hooked up so fast and easy (1 slight issue discussed later), even easier than my go-to TP-Link brand (no dual switch choice though) on both the App and Alexa discovery. Both switches Alexa responsive (no Master/Slave button or Grouping issues). The one minor set-up is that it lost it's set-up mode while I was reading instructions. I still had outlet open so I disconnected hot to reset (otherwise it wanted me to go through entire routine) so I suggest you be willing to add quickly to Smart Life to avoid the pairing timeout. After install I killed and restored the breaker to check its power outage recovery (a weak point for many brands) and it restored admirably. Very surprised and pleased with performance and granted a VERY rare 5 stars by me.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.title: I'm Not Easily Impressed--But WOW

Used web site provided by Amazon to contact them, no one responds in the chat and no response to in page contact for over a month. Basically, throwing your money away with this company. Many more options available with actual product support.

reviews.text: easy to install and works as expected. the package arrived on time, the switche was as pictured, it was easy to install, even in a flat that does not have an earth wire (I connected a wire to the internal metal box), and it started working manually right out of the box. the android app is simple to set up and integrates with Google Home quickly, although it is a bit confusing that 3 switches appear (one for everything, and one for each individual lamp), but you get used to it quickly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
reviews.title: easy to install and works as expected

reviews.productTitle: Nexete Smart Wi-Fi Double Light Switch, 2 in1 Single Pole Switch Compatible with Alexa Google Assistant & IFTTT,Remote Control, Timing Function No Hub Required (1-Pack Double)
reviews.text: This dual switch would be great if not for poor wifi reception and it doesn't stay connected to wifi network. I used this control my yard landscaping lights so it needed to turn on at night and off in morning. Using a Google Home routine, it would turn on less than half the time. And likewise in morning, it would off less than half the time. This dual switch was mounted next to a Treatlife single switch and replaced a prior Treatlife switch. I never had any issues with these Treatlife switches in over the past year that they were mounted in this same location. So it is not a router wifi problem. This switch is the problem. It's too bad that this dual switch has such a poor wifi interface because I really wanted to put a regular outlet next to this dual switch. I also tried a dual Youngzuth smart switch but it also had poor wifi reception, however it was even worse in that it wouldn't ever automatically reconnect once it lost wifi connection until I manually reset it. I ultimately had to remove this dual switch and a dumb outlet so that I could go back to 2 separate Treatlife smart wifi switches which are working flawlessly right now. The labeling on the back of the switch is incorrect and shows lack of attention to detail in the design. The black wire's Line In is labeled the same text as one of the brown Load1 outputs, hence there are two wires labeled as "L/Load1" and one of them is actually the Line In. The other brown wire is correctly labeled "Load2".
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.title: Poor wifi reception

reviews.productTitle: Nexete Smart Wi-Fi Double Light Switch, 2 in1 Single Pole Switch Compatible with Alexa Google Assistant & IFTTT,Remote Control, Timing Function No Hub Required (1-Pack Double)
reviews.text: Works exactly as it should. It does use stranded wires as leads for hot neutral and loads so you need wire ties or crim connectors to attach them which requires space. I was able to obtain the space by using it to replace two three way switches and mounting it in a the upstairs location and used the second gang with a blank to hold the wires and ties. I used the former traveler wires marked with white to deliver proper hot and neutral to the downstairs former 3 way locations, along with a porch light switch and put a USB receptacle and a blank in place of the former downstairs 3 ways. Pictures show the switch, next shows the downstairs setup with USB and different switch and in third, I hold up the old style toggle switch cover I replaced. I can now say Alexa, turn on the hall light or Alexa, turn on the living room light. Since this is an older home{1930} I will alert that most consumers would need an electrician to do this installation safely. It is much easier in 1980 and later homes with neutral wires as with most smart switches.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.title: Works exactly as it should.

reviews.productTitle: Nexete Smart Wi-Fi Double Light Switch, 2 in1 Single Pole Switch Compatible with Alexa Google Assistant & IFTTT,Remote Control, Timing Function No Hub Required (1-Pack Double)
reviews.text: The installation was very easy to install. The sad part is, the wi-fi could not find the wireless switch. I deleted the app multiple times, reinstalled the app and the app could not find the device over multiple tries with no success, at all. The instructions said reset the device to get the light to flash, for the app to sync with the device. I could not find a reset button on the switch. The wireless switch devices can be turned on manually. I decided to work the lights manually and deleted the app from my phone. I read the reviews online and discovered that I was not the only one having trouble with syncing the app with the switch. I will keep the switch and use it manually. My recommendation: Do not purchase this Smart WI-FI Double Light Switch because the app does not work.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.title: Nexete Smart Wi-Fi Double Light Switch, 2 in1 Single Pole Switch

reviews.text: The item is easy to install and works well via touch, however the wifi connection constantly disconnects and the connection from Alexa works for a few days then you have to delete the switch and remove all the wifi settings to relink it. I have only had the switch for a month and have had to reconnect it from scratch to Alexa 3x now. Wifi signal is very strong and all other switches in the same area and even further outside the house in the detached garage work just fine and don’t have this issue. Seems it is an issue with this particular item. All other switches are Kasa Switches. They didn’t make a dual integrated one which is why I purchased this one.

reviews.productTitle: Nexete Smart Wi-Fi Double Light Switch, 2 in1 Single Pole Switch Compatible with Alexa Google Assistant & IFTTT,Remote Control, Timing Function No Hub Required (1-Pack Double)
reviews.text: These are at my dock which has a full signal and over 50 MB per second Internet speed. Anything and everything has great signal there except these. I have to take a pretty good walk into the woods to get to the breaker to switch them off and back on to try to reconnect. Sometimes it works great but most of the time it does not work when I really need it. They are in a metal box but I have put a 1 inch thick plastic extender on the box, drilled holes all over the bottom of the box and I think short of a major electrical job to switch out the boxes I have them in I’m stuck with this problem. I can hold my phone anywhere and everywhere around the switch and I get a full five bars of network signal.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2022
reviews.title: Frustrating, tired of playing cat and mouse trying to keep that thing connected to my network
